SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RECNUM , t.* FROM (SELECT GOODS_ID , GOODS_TITLE , GOODS_WRITER , GOODS_PUBLISHER , GOODS_SALES_PRICE , TO_CHAR(GOODS_ENTER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GOODS_ENTER_DATE , TO_CHAR(GOODS_PUBLISHED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GOODS_PUBLISHED_DATE FROM GOODS WHERE TO_CHAR(GOODS_ENTER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{beginDate} and #{endDate}
AND GOODS_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%'
AND GOODS_ID LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%'
AND GOODS_PUBLISHER LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%'
ORDER BY GOODS_ENTER_DATE DESC)t) WHERE RECNUM BETWEEN (#{section}-1)*100 + (#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 AND (#{section}-1)*100 + (#{pageNum})*10

SELECT G.* , TO_CHAR(G.GOODS_PUBLISHED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GOODS_PUBLISHED_DATE , I.FILENAME FROM GOODS G, GOODS_IMAGE I WHERE G.GOODS_ID=I.GOODS_ID AND I.FILETYPE='main_image' AND G.GOODS_ID=#{goods_id} ORDER BY G.GOODS_ID
SELECT * FROM GOODS_IMAGE WHERE GOODS_ID=#{goods_id} ORDER BY IMAGE_ID ASC
